column8: tuna, farfalle pasta, bow tie pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, onions, diced tomatoes with juice, dry white wine, capers, rosemary, kalamata olive, ground black pepper, salt, Italian parsley
column13:
Prepare pasta according to package directions. Set aside. Place oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and onions and saut√© for about 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and juice, wine, capers, rosemary, olives and pepper to onions. Simmer for 5 minutes. Raise heat to medium and cook another 3 minutes until sauce thickens slightly. Add salt to taste. Combine tuna, sauce and parsley with pasta.

column4: Pasta Sauce With Chicken and Olives
column8: chicken breast, olive oil, garlic cloves, mushrooms, onion, diced tomatoes with juice, banana peppers, white wine, chicken broth, black olives, green olives, capers, oregano, pesto sauce, salt, black pepper, romano cheese, linguine
column13: Cook pasta in boiling water until tender, set aside. Saute chicken ,garlic, onion and peppers in oil until onions are transparent. Add wine, tomatoes, and broth, Simmer 15 minutes. Add olives, capers, pesto and  seasonings  cook 5 minutes. Add cheese serve over pasta.

column4: Pasta With Cream Curry and Salmon
column8: pasta, mascarpone, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, curry, smoked salmon, butter
column13:
Brin a large pot of water to th eboil and add salt. Blend the ricotte, curry, cream, mascarpone and parmesan. Season. Toss pasta in the boiling water and cook as  instructed. In a  saucepan heat the sauce mixing all the time on a low flame until slightly hot.
Add the salmon. drain the pasta and toss with the sauce. season with pepper and serve hot.
